item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Nyxt: The Hacker's Browser (180 points | 71 comments)
3. Reverse engineering the Sega Channel game image file format (131 points | 24 comments)

10. PostgreSQL High Availability Solutions – Part 1: Jepsen Test and Patroni (79 points | 12 comments)

12. My4th Light – Custom 8-Bit Forth CPU (40 points | 8 comments)

21. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)

25. I algorithmically donated $5000 to Open Source (329 points | 71 comments)
26. Biggest shell programs (223 points | 109 comments)
27. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (306 points | 104 comments)
28. Can life emerge around a white dwarf? (130 points | 82 comments)
29. The UC Berkeley Project That Is the AI Industry's Obsession (4 points | discuss)
30. Hacker.txt (1993) (31 points | 2 comments)
